title: Could not find artifact io.quarkus:quarkus-smallrye-health-spi:jar:2.8.0.Final
body:
### Describe the bug

When I upgrade to quarkus 2.8.Final, the build is failing with
```
[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO] 
[INFO] ---------< io.quarkiverse.mybatis:quarkus-mybatis-deployment >----------
[INFO] Building Quarkus - Mybatis - Deployment 1.0.3-SNAPSHOT
[INFO] --------------------------------[ jar ]---------------------------------
Downloading from central: https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/io/quarkus/quarkus-smallrye-health-spi/2.8.0.Final/quarkus-smallrye-health-spi-2.8.0.Final.jar
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD FAILURE
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time:  2.320 s
[INFO] Finished at: 2022-03-31T23:12:34+08:00
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal on project quarkus-mybatis-deployment: Could not resolve dependencies for project io.quarkiverse.mybatis:quarkus-mybatis-deployment:jar:1.0.3-SNAPSHOT: Could not find artifact io.quarkus:quarkus-smallrye-health-spi:jar:2.8.0.Final in central (https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2) -> [Help 1]
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch.
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:
[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/DependencyResolutionException

```

I just curl with https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/io/quarkus/quarkus-smallrye-health-spi/2.8.0.Final/quarkus-smallrye-health-spi-2.8.0.Final.jar and it returns 404.

So it might be an issue with maven central repo but can anyone check it ?

### Expected behavior

It should be success to get ```io.quarkus:quarkus-smallrye-health-spi:jar:2.8.0.Final```

### Actual behavior

maven central repo returns 404

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_
